title: Battlefield Hardline will join the EA Access Vault on the Xbox One October 14
text:
Battlefield Hardline will join the EA Access Vault on the Xbox One October 14 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Xbox One owners who subscribe to the EA Access service will have something to look forward to on October 14. That's when Electronic Arts wil...
